column1: thank you so much for having me today. I am so happy to have this meeting with you.
My name is Samuel and I am a seasoned Full Stack Developer specializing in C# .NET with a strong financial and stock market background working for more than 25 years in this field.
And I'd like to join the Andelans talent network. So
column2: let’s get it started. What do you prepare for us today ?
